media/user/SCRAPE/test/2017-05-asasin-paranoic/extracted/Asasin Paranoic/03 Fire In The Sky III
Asasin Paranoic - Fire In The Sky
Asasin Paranoic - Fire In The Sky

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 16, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
This shit. All day long....and hopefully all night. Primitive bedroom electronic/industrial brilliance, there must be legions of these acts releasing tapes in sub-dozen runs that will just languish until inevitable obscurity. There are so many of them. It's impossible to think one could find them all, so we enjoy what we can get our hands on. Fire In The Sky is a three part opus - a murky and relatively mellow wash shielding erratic beats and awkward sounds from direct engagement. Things really get rolling around the six minute mark of Part II, but by then (if you've been listening properly) you'll be in a haze anyway. Folks from Nostilevo, SIOBHAN, LFA (in case that stuff matters to you). Shit is real ill, enjoy. FIRE IN THE SKY
https://nostilevo.bandcamp.com/
